Name: Cham 69 #1
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with lemonade, stir and serve with straws.
History: Named after the band, Sham 69, and created by yours truly back in 1998 when I was something of a beginner with a sweet tooth. I've since seen it on cocktail menus across Europe.
Nutrition: One serving of Cham 69 #1 contains 296 calories
